G4709-d-02-06-00-WC.Primary Accident Cause: Shoving movement, absence of man on or at leading end of movement
G4709-d-02-06-00-WC.Narrative: THE ENGINEER HAD RECEIVED PERMISSION FROM THE CSX RB DISPATCHER TO PROCEED TO ROCKWELL AND ENTER THESINGLE TRACK FOR MOVEMENT ONTO THE UP TRACK 2.  HE CONTACTED THE TERMINAL TRAIN DISPATCHER FOR PERMISSION TO ENTER HIS RAILROAD AND WAS GIVEN PERMISSION FROM CSX SINGLE TRACK TO THE UP TRACK 2 AND TOCONTINUE TO TRACK CJ 2.  AFTER COMPLETING THAT MOVE, THE ENGINEER THEN CALLED THE ASHLAND AVE. YARDMASTER AND ADVISED HIM THAT THEY WERE HEADING TOWARDS ASH STREET.  THEY WERE TO TOLD TO HOLD UP FORANOTHER TRAIN. THERE WAS APPROXIMATELY 5 MINUTES FROM THE TIME THE SWITCH WAS LINED FOR THEIR MOVEMENT TO THE TIME THE ENGINEER CONTACTED THE RB DISPATCHER TO CONFIRM THAT THEY COULD OCCUPY THAT TRACK.  ONCE THEY HAD THAT PERMISSION, THE ENGINEER SHOVING BACK TO CLEAR THE BN CONNECTION TRACK AND STOPPED. AFTER A WESTBOUND TRAIN WENT UP TO THE BN AND CLEARED THE TRACK, THE ENGINEER CONTACTED THE ASHLAND YARDMASTER FOR PERMISSION TO PROCEED.  HE WAS TOLD TO PULL UP TO ASH ST.  AND ATTEMPTED TO DOSO.  AFTER PULLING APPROXIMATELY 4 TO 6 CARS, THE AIR DUMPED.  THE CREW WAS INFORMED THAT THEY HAD CARS ON THE GROUND. INVESTIGATION FOUND THAT THE ENGINEER SHOULD HAVE HAD THE CONDUCTOR PROTECT THEIRSHOVE THUS PREVENTING THEM FROM SHOVING THRU THE SWITCH AND THEN PULLING AHEAD CAUSING THE CARS TODERAIL.None

EQ20000204-d-02-29-00-LI.Narrative: TC824 WAS OPERATING EASTWARD IN HOLBAN YARD.  AS THIS MAINTENANCE EQUIPMENT PROCEEDED THROUGH THE 13/14 TRACK DIVIDER SWITCH THE R-3 WHEEL DERAILED AT THE FROG IN THE CROSSOVER.  THIS MAINTENANCE EQUIPMENT WAS OPERATING AS ONE COUPLED UNIT (MDZ MODE) AS IT WAS MOVED THROUGH THIS CURVED TURNOUT LOCATION.  THE CAUSE OF THIS INCIDENT WAS DETERMINED TO BE THE METHOD OF OPERATION OF THIS TYPE TRACK MAINTENANCE EQUIPMENT, COUPLED AS ONE UNIT ON HIGH DEGREE CURVED PORTION OF TRACK.  NOTICE HAS BEEN DISTRIBUTED TO TRACK SUPERVISORS RESTRICTING OPERATION WITH THIS TYPE MAINTENANCE EQUIPMENT COUPLED ASONE UNIT (IN DMZ MODE) ON HIGH DEGREE CURVED RAIL LOCATIONS.NoneNoneNoneNoneNoneNoneNoneNone
